LanguageData.TiberiumCraterGreen_TBNS.label: Green Tiberium Field
LanguageData.TiberiumCraterBlue_TBNS.label: Blue Tiberium Field
LanguageData.TiberiumCraterBlue_TBNS.description: A beautiful field of blue Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumMeteor_TBNS.label: Tiberium Meteor
LanguageData.TiberiumMeteor_TBNS.description: An extraterrestrial meteor. Contains glowing crystal of all sorts.
LanguageData.TiberiumMonolith_TBNS.label: blue Tiberium monolith
LanguageData.TiberiumMonolith_TBNS.description: A blue monolith growing out of the ground.
LanguageData.BlossomTree_TBNS.label: blossom tree
LanguageData.BlossomTree_TBNS.description: A strange tree with alien properties. It seems to grow green crystals.
LanguageData.TiberiumShard_TBNS.label: tiberium shard
LanguageData.Veinhole_TBNS.label: Veinhole
LanguageData.Veinhole_TBNS.description: A veinhole. A strange lifeform developed by Tiberium. It produces veins around itself that can be harvested. Be aware of blunt damage. Coming too close to the center might cause infection by poisonous gases.
LanguageData.TiberiumTower_TBNS.label: green Tiberium tower
LanguageData.TiberiumTower_TBNS.description: A green tower rising from the ground. These structures normally take years to form.
